tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PrintRun (print_run_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
publication_id INT,
print_date DATE,
print_location VARCHAR(255),
print_quantity INT);

CREATE TABLE ProductionSchedule (schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
print_run_id INT,
production_date DATE,
production_location VARCHAR(255),
production_status VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE DistributionTimeline (timeline_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
publication_id INT,
distribution_date DATE,
distribution_location VARCHAR(255),
distribution_status VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE PrintProduction (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_id INT,
    print_run_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES Publication (publication_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (print_run_id) REFERENCES PrintRun (print_run_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Distribution (
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_id INT,
    distribution_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES Publication (publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Deadline (
    deadline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_id INT,
    deadline_date DATE,
    deadline_type TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES Publication (publication_id)
);
